column2: "Na aber a bosoom a otsia esuon no durii
column3: na Israelmba tsetse nkurow no mu no
column4: nna ɔman no poon hɔnho hyiae dɛ nyimpa kor baa Jerusalɛm."

column7: na wokesii Israel Nyankopɔn n’afɔrmbukyia no
column8: dɛ wɔrobɔ hyew afɔr wɔ do
column9: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Nyame nyimpa Moses ne mbra no mu no."

column2: "Na wɔdze afɔrmbukyia no sii ne ngyinado no do; na suro baa hɔn do osian amanaman do nkorɔfo no ntsi: na wɔbɔɔ hyew afɔr wɔ do maa EWURADZE
column3: mekyerɛ hyew afɔr anapa na ewimbir."

column4: na wɔbɔɔ daa daa hyew afɔr no
column7: na dɛ mbrɛ da biara no ho nhyehyɛɛ tse;"

column2: "na n’ekyir no wɔbɔɔ daa hyew afɔr
column4: na EWURADZE n’afahyɛ a wɔahyehyɛ ayɛ no krɔnkrɔn no nyinara dze
column5: na obiara a ɔpra ne yamu bɔ ayamuyi afɔr ma EWURADZE no dze so."

column2: "Ofitsi bosoom a otsia esuon no ne da a odzi kan no mu na wɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ wɔrobɔ hyew afɔr ama EWURADZE: nna EWURADZE n’asɔrdan no ne fapem no dze

column3: na nduadwimfo no so; na wɔdze edziban
column8: dɛ wɔmfa nkyindur ndua mfi Lebanon nkɔ po ho wɔ Jopa
column9: dɛ mbrɛ kwan a Persiahen Sirus dze maa hɔn no tse."

column2: "Afei hɔn mbae a wɔbaa Nyankopɔn fi no ho wɔ Jerusalɛm no n’afe a otsia ebien no mu
column3: bosoom a otsia ebien no mu no
column6: na hɔn nuanom asɔfo nkaa no na Levifo no
column7: na hɔn a wofii ndɔmmumkɔ no mu baa Jerusalɛm no nyinara hyɛɛ ase; na wɔdze Levifo a woedzi mfe eduonu dze rokɔ no sisii hɔ dɛ wɔnhwɛ EWURADZE fi no n’edwuma do."

column2: "Nna Jesua ɔnye ne mba na no nuanom
column6: dɛ wɔrohwɛ Nyankopɔn fie edwumayɛfo no do: na Henadadmba
column7: wɔnye hɔn mba na hɔn nuanom Levifo no so."

column2: "Na aber a adantofo no hyɛɛ EWURADZE asɔrdan no ne fapem no ase no
column3: wɔdze asɔfo a woewuna hɔn ntar na wɔdzedze mbɛn gyinagyina hɔ na Asaf ne mba Levifo no wɔdzedze nkasaa gyinagyina hɔ
column5: dɛ mbrɛ Israelhen David ne nhyehyɛɛ no tse."

column2: "Na wɔbɔɔ mu toow ndwom wɔ ayɛyi na ndaase mu memaa EWURADZE
column6: wɔ Israel do. Na ɔman no nyinara dze esebɔ kɛse bɔɔ ose
column7: wɔ aber a woriyi EWURADZE ayɛw no
column8: osiandɛ wɔato EWURADZE ne dan no ne fapem ntsi."

column2: "Na asɔfo na Levifo na egyanom efiefi etsitsir no
column3: nkɔdaa a wohun fie a odzi kan no ana wɔresɛɛ no no
column4: aber a wɔtoo fie kor yi ne fapem wɔ hɔn enyim no
column5: wɔdze ndze kɛse sui; na dodowara so bɔɔ ose kɛse wɔ enyigye ntsi:"

column2: "ma dɛm ntsi ɔman no enntum ennhu enyigye osebɔ ne dede no na ɔman no hɔn su no ne dede no mu nsonsonee: osiandɛ ɔman no dze esebɔ kɛse bɔɔ ose
column3: na dede no wɔtsee no wɔ ekyirkyiikyir."
